tooltips.navbarConfigList: Define multiple navbar configurations. Each configuration has its own tab list. Users can switch between them using a selector in the sidebar. Resolution priority: 1) Navbar config system (if any configs exist), 2) Legacy tab customization, 3) System default tabList.
tooltips.navbarConfigDisabled: If checked, users cannot create their own navbar configurations. They will use the system-level configurations only.
tooltips.navbarConfigSelectorDisabled: If checked, the navbar config selector dropdown will be hidden from the sidebar, even if multiple configurations exist.
